effect.red_blue: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.red_green_japan: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.
effect.blue_japan: Inflicts regular damage. After the battle ends, the winner receives five times the user’s level in extra money for each time this move was used.

short_effect.red_blue: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.yellow: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.red_green_japan: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
short_effect.blue_japan: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.
